values:
Some new art, though not HP inspired. I was listening to Panic! At the Disco and was triggered by the line 'oh, what a wonderful caricature of intimacy.' I then drew this whore-ish looking marrionette.

(Haha, oh gosh, that song just came up on my MP3. Talk about creepy.)

I tried my hand at some Photoshop colouring.

Title:  Martini
Rating: PG
Comments: I'm happy with how this turned out, though I wish I wasn't rubbish at backgrounds and could actually do them. Oh well.



Comments are treasured!

NEW ART! Hurrah - that is like ... so cool.

For picture number one we have a sketchy drawing of my OTP being nice and fluffy, as per usual.

Title:  Kisses
Rating: PG
Comments: Redheads and bushy-haired brunettes are love. (If you don't know what pairing I'm hinting at I shake my head at you.)

Preview:

As for the second picture, this one is a bit of a different style, for me, and is of Narcissa. You can't see her face, but I was trying to experiment more with color and flow than with actual body parts.

Title: Secrecy
Rating: G
Comments: Watercolors are le cool. So is cross-hatching.

Preview:

Title: Realization
Characters: Remus/Lily <3 
Rating: PG
Medium: 6B Pencil
Notes: Drawing this picture inspired a plot bunny from me, and I am now writing a Lily/Remus titled: "The Pigeon Can't Fly"

P.S - It's not my fault the scan is so bad. Actually, it isn't even a scan. My scanner is broken and so I had to load it off my camera. *blush*

Welcome to my new lj! This is my first ever art post, hope you enjoy it!

Title: Study Time
Characters: Ron/Hermione
Rating: G
Medium: Regular ol' pencil
Notes:  Is it just me, or do guys love smelling their girlfriend's hair?




Title: Dining Out 
Characters: Harry/Luna
Rating: G
Medium: Regular ol' pencil
Notes: Made for deanine, who is a big Harry/Luna shipper. :D



Title: Hold Me
Characters: Ron/Hermione
Rating: PG
Medium: More regular ol' pencil
Notes:




That's it for now. hopefully I'll be able to update fairily soon again as well as get photoshop so I can do them in color!
